/apps/ACC/GCC/11.4.0/bin/g++ -g  -Wl,-rpath -Wl,/apps/ACC/OPENMPI/4.1.5/GCC/lib -Wl,--enable-new-dtags CMakeFiles/MPI_CUDA_Example.dir/MPI_CUDA_Example_generated_main.cu.o -o MPI_CUDA_Example  -Wl,-rpath,/gpfs/apps/MN5/ACC/OPENMPI/4.1.5/GCC/lib /usr/local/cuda-12.2/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib64/librt.a /gpfs/apps/MN5/ACC/OPENMPI/4.1.5/GCC/lib/libmpi.so /usr/local/cuda-12.2/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib64/librt.a /gpfs/apps/MN5/ACC/OPENMPI/4.1.5/GCC/lib/libmpi.so
